## RGB interface


## Properties

| Property     | Modifiers | Type                | Description                           |
| ------------ | --------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| [`b`](RGB/b) |           | <code>number</code> | Blue integer value between 0 and 255  |
